abstracts.cdata!:
The environmental assessment report is
            based on a study on the current environmental impacts of
            relevant social, physical, ecological, noise, air quality,
            cultural relic and historic sites along the highway corridor
            200-1000 meters within both sides of the Xinjiang provincial
            highway.  The report covers the following impacts: 1) air
            quality and influence upon air circumstance by vehicular
            tail gas; 2) acoustic environment and influence upon it by
            traffic noise and construction noise; 3) grassland, present
            agricultural conditions and impacts of the project; 4) wild
            animals and impacts of the project; 5) the project influence
            upon surface water; 6) social economy; 7) analysis on risk
            of the highway project; and 8) analysis on economic profit
            and loss of environmental influence of the project.
